DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effect OrthoPulse™ , intra-oral LED ( Light Emitting Diode ) photobiomodulation device , orthodontic treatment time . This double-blinded RCT half patient receive treatment sham non-functional device , serve control , half receive light therapy treatment functional OrthoPulse™ . Orthodontic treatment time sham-control patient compare OrthoPulse™ patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intra-Oral Photobiomodulation Orthodontic Treatment Time
DOC.criteria: Presence permanent dentition Eligible schedule full mouth fix orthodontic treatment . Class I Class II malocclusion ( ½ cusp Class II ) Nonextraction quadrant Nonsmoker , nonuse chew tobacco Good oral hygiene No adjunct treatment extra intraoral appliance Age 1240 Pregnant female Patient currently enrol another clinical study Nonsteroidal AntiInflammatory drug ( NSAID ) use study ( Acetominophen acceptable ) Periodontally involved teeth Use bisphosphonates Unerupted erupted teeth Teeth block alignment unable engage initial arch wire
